You kissed the shiny straight smooth hair she wore.  And you held her tight as though all the love came back to you.  You took off your promise ring--a promise to another girl.  You looked this one in her eyes, a dark arousing gaze.  The brown to the green.  Hot flesh to hot flesh.  Sweat escaping pores.  Eyes wide with desired, the coveted in your hands alas.  The sweet moment of intimate contact came and you were delighted.  Delighted to feel this..so warm and tight.  Delighted to love her just one last time.  Delighted to look into the green and see the blurbs of love and emotion she still had for you.  You push harder and deeper into her body and her soul.  You remember the first stages of innocent love.  You remember when she made the first move to kiss you.  The innocence dwindled into rock hard passion.  She'd let you travel deep inside every inch of her personal life.  She cared about you--she tried to watch out for you.  When she had to leave you got deep inside her one last time.  The thick cushion of raptured feelings diminished into this.  She still wanted you despite the pain.  You'd have none of that, since the tables were turned.  Drugs and irresponsibility shaded her eyes.  You still loved every inch of her.  You still thought she was beautiful, even though this love could not work again.  Your passion for her took you both to a new level of pleasure and allure.  At first response it felt like a mistake, but all along you just realized she was in love with you once again and you couldn't put yourself through the agony of human thought.  The love bleeds through your skin.  You can still taste her and feel her excitement.  And she wants you too, more true to heart than ever.  You know it's beautiful.  You realize you'd be happy with her--to be with her--but you can't bring yourself to it.  It would be excruciating to look into the green and see those raptured feelings.  It would be agony to taste her excitement and get inside her again.  It would be agony to realize what you were without all this time.
